thread.title: SUSAN MURPHY

author: SUSAN MURPHY
title: SUSAN MURPHY
text: Just returned and have nothing but great things to say about our trip to Hawaii. The trip was well planned with a knowledgeable tour director and well paced. All of the meals included exceeded our expectations and the accommodations were excellent. Our goal was to see as much as we could while we were there and that goal was accomplished. I recommend without reservation!
